We simulated data with pve = 0.02, 0.1 and 0.3. We reduced the sample size for larger PVE, n=12,500 for PVE=0.02, n=2,500 for PVE=0.1, and n=800 for PVE=0.3. SuSiE related methods used refinement procedure.

PVE = 0.005 (from previous simulation, n = 50,000)
